Hi, my name is

Andrei Albu.

I build things for the cloud.

Cloud Developer at Deloitte and Computer Science student at McMaster University. I specialize in cloud infrastructure, API development, and DevOps automation.

01.Experience

2024

Cloud Solutions Developer @ Deloitte

Designed and implemented API endpoints for Kubernetes cluster provisioning in Azure using AKS, streamlining user deployment processes. Followed OpenAPI specifications for consistent API design, ensuring seamless integration with existing services. Assisted in training a GenAI bot on internal documentation, improving team members' access to accurate responses.

AzureAKSKubernetesOpenAPIGenAI
2023

Cloud Platform Developer @ Deloitte

Developed scripts to improve AWS account management, reducing maintenance time and simplifying policy detachment. Deployed scripts on AWS Lambda and managed queues with Amazon SQS, enhancing event processing efficiency by 50%. Implemented an IP Address Management feature for GCP accounts with Supernet IP Usage Monitoring and Threshold Alerting.

AWSLambdaSQSGCPPython
2022

Cloud API Developer @ Deloitte

Reduced deployment time by 84% by switching from AWS CloudFormation to HashiCorp Terraform. Created API endpoints with OpenAPI specs, enhancing functionality and integration accuracy. Dockerized applications and integrated with GitHub Codespaces, accelerating onboarding by up to 80%.

TerraformDockerGitHub ActionsAzure DevOpsAWS

02.Projects

A complete financial website offering stock tracking features, information about investing and more. Helps investors build their personal wealth with up-to-date information and statistics about the latest stocks.

CareBridge

A healthcare tool using AI to simplify medical documents and enhance communication. Leveraging OpenAI's GPT model, it translates complex jargon into plain English with AI-driven text extraction for reliable health insights.

Covi

A comprehensive Covid-19 Discord bot built with Python. Uses Discord.py, Serpapi for Google News scraping, and Disease.sh API for local and global Covid-19 statistics.

03.About Me

I'm an ambitious and driven computer science student with a passion for cloud technologies and software development. Currently in my fourth year at McMaster University / Athabasca University, I've been building real-world experience through multiple roles at Deloitte working on cloud infrastructure and API development.

I've attended hackathons like Hack the North 2021, and I enjoy pushing myself to learn new technologies and tackle complex problems. Outside of tech, you can find me playing basketball, working out, or reading about the latest developments in information technology.

Here are some technologies I've been working with:

  • AWS (Lambda, SQS, CloudFormation)
  • Azure (AKS, DevOps)
  • Google Cloud Platform
  • Terraform / IaC
  • Docker & Kubernetes
  • Python & TypeScript
